title.narrative: Connecting the causal dots: Identifying, Understanding and Communicating Peacebuilding Impact

description.narrative: 1. To identify and communicate the impact of our advocacy and dialogue work, at different levels, to enable more effective, impactful and sustainable outcomes. 2. To contribute to the peacebuilding sector through sharing with partners and peers, the useful peacebuilding M&E methods that are generated by the project.

Goal: To enhance Alertâ€™s ability to assess and learn from the impact of its advocacy and dialogue work, communicate this impact and share its learning more effectively internally and with the wider peacebuilding sector.
The project aims to achieve this goal through two specific objectives:
1. To identify and communicate the impact of our advocacy and dialogue work, at different levels, to enable more effective, impactful and sustainable outcomes. 2. To contribute to the peacebuilding sector through sharing with partners and peers, the useful peacebuilding M&E methods that are generated by the project.
To achieve these objectives and reach the project goal, the project will have the following outcomes:
Outcomes for Objective 1:
1.1 Alert has developed a clear and deeper understanding of the impact of its advocacy and dialogue work and how and why our work is effective. 1.2 Alert has developed or adapted and then tested various M&E tools and methodologies. 1.3 Alert programme staff have committed to integrating lessons from this process into new or existing work or programme development across the organisation. 1.4 Alert has improved its internal and external communication of its advocacy and dialogue impact
Outcomes for Objective 2:
2.1 Local partnersâ€™ and peersâ€™ M&E skills have been enhanced through workshops, lessons sharing and use of tailored M&E tools. 2.2 Alert has initiated and contributed to the debate on measuring impact of advocacy and dialogue and effective advocacy and dialogue work in peacebuilding.
International Alert, partners and the peacebuilding/DME community generally.
